--- !bad_plus.sql
1 +

--- Error
syntax error: testdata/input/expr/!bad_plus.sql:2:1: unexpected token: <eof>

  2:  
      ^


--- AST
&ast.BadExpr{
  BadNode: &ast.BadNode{
    NodeEnd: 3,
    Tokens:  []*token.Token{
      &token.Token{
        Kind: "<int>",
        Raw:  "1",
        Base: 10,
        End:  1,
      },
      &token.Token{
        Kind:  "+",
        Space: " ",
        Raw:   "+",
        Pos:   2,
        End:   3,
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
1 +
